main event: A civilian reported observing a flying object described as a 'flying cigar' over Haifa, with similar sightings occurring in the area.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 30 seconds,The object moved at great speed and changed direction rapidly,Four men returning from work in a quarry were witnesses to the event,Two flying saucers were also seen over Mt. Carmel recently,This preliminary report seeks further verification from the foreign liaison office.
witness description: four men returning from work in a quarry
